title: Jason Mantzoukas | Nicolle Wallace
description:
In this episode, Seth interviews actor and comedian Jason Mantzoukas, who also takes a few more questions backstage with producer Kevin Miller. (0:21)
Then, MSNBC's Nicolle Wallace talks to Seth about being an anti-Trump Republican. Wallace then continues the conversation with producer Henry Melcher backstage. (13:52)
